name: The Gatherer
credits:
Rita-Bernstein - Character art, ZHS translation
MappyTheKat - Old character splash art
Jedi - RUS translation
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 7 relics.

v0.9.0 (2019-05-05)
Rita-Bernstein kindly gave me the new art for the character and 3 relics! Also, ZHS translation is added.

Bug fixes/Improvements
- Fixed potential issue where some objects look semi-transparent.
- Potion Sack UI no longer appears on top of screens like HandSelectScreen.
- Now uses unique Keyword system the Basemod. This allows the following:
  - Flower keyword no longer clashes with Florist mod.
  - "unique" text from Defect's Compile Driver is no longer highlighted with gatherer's keyword.
  - Fixes more keyword clash problem with existing/future mods that i'm unaware of.

Card Changes
- Mining Strike now gives plated armor per 10(8) unblocked damage. (was 12(10))
- Sealed Bomb damage increased 40(48) -> 50(60)
- Feeling Fine Cost increased 0(0) -> 1(0)
- Upgraded Feeling Fine no longer has Innate.
- Black Tea Cost increased 1(0) -> 1(1)
- Black Tea Strength decreased 4(4) -> 3(4)

Relic Changes
- Mist Generator now stops poison from decreasing when the enemy has 8 or less poison. (was 5)

Visit https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/1611788501 for full change notes.
